name: Bourbon Chocolate Fondue
description: The bourbon can be omitted for a kid-friendly dessert.
recipeIngredient: Accompaniments: cubed pound cake, marshmallows, cigarette wafer cookies, strawberries, cut fruit

recipeInstructions.text: Heat cream in medium saucepan over medium-high heat until just simmering. Reduce heat to low and stir in chocolate until smooth. Stir in bourbon. Serve with desired accompaniments.
